product.title: Cello Puro Kids Stainless Steel Inner Water Bottle for Kids, Blue, 600 Milliliters
product.categories_flat: Home & Kitchen > Kitchen & Dining > Kitchen Storage & Containers > Water Bottles
product.description: Cello brings you a perfect gift for kids for all occasions consisting of a water bottle which will for sure bring a big smile on their faces. The cool tiffin box with tinker bell graphics is the best thing to give to your child for their school. Make meals fun for your kids with this trendy lunch box. The lid of the lunch box is the powerful tinker bell that will kill the hunger monster trying to attack your kids. This cello tiffin combines design and quality together to make the best lunch box and water bottle combo for children. The premium grade plastic product has been manufactured keeping children in mind. The make of the sturdy bottle is as good as that of its matching lunchbox

top_reviews.title: Cap is of very poor quality
top_reviews.body: Quality of the bottle is good but that of cap is equally poor. It cracked within a month and now the bottle is useless. Atleast the seller should give extra cap or atleast make caps available for sale, since many buyers have reported this. Can't throw away the bottle for the cap.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Quality of the bottle is good but that of cap is equally poor. It cracked within a month and now the bottle is useless. Atleast the seller should give extra cap or atleast make caps available for sale, since many buyers have reported this. Can't throw away the bottle for the cap.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Poor quality cap broke in just one week
top_reviews.body: Bottle is leak proof but the cap broke in just a week. Very poor quality of cap. Cello should provide one more plain bottle cap without sipper as the cap breaks so easily.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Bottle is leak proof but the cap broke in just a week. Very poor quality of cap. Cello should provide one more plain bottle cap without sipper as the cap breaks so easily.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Never expected this from Cello brand
top_reviews.body: Just washed it before using n kept over night for drying. It is already rusted.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Just washed it before using n kept over night for drying. It is already rusted.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
top_reviews.body: The media could not be loaded. Cello company has good name . Only cello name made me to buy this. Though I read several reviews broke bottles after delivery I ordered. But I received the same broken item. Seller has to verify these kind of items before delivering to buyerRead more
top_reviews.body_html:
The media could not be loaded.
 Cello company has good name . Only cello name made me to buy this. Though I read several reviews broke bottles after delivery I ordered. But I received the same broken item. Seller has to verify these kind of items before delivering to buyer
Read more

top_reviews.title: Good product
top_reviews.body: It's nice stainless steel insulated children bottle for kids. I received the same color as shown in picture. It is of 600 ML capacity, so enough for kid. After using it for 2 days, found no leaking, sturdy, so attractive that due to this my daughter's water consumption increased :) Overall it is a good product.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
It's nice stainless steel insulated children bottle for kids. I received the same color as shown in picture.
It is of 600 ML capacity, so enough for kid.
After using it for 2 days, found no leaking, sturdy, so attractive that due to this my daughter's water consumption increased :)
Overall it is a good product.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Plastic quality is not good.
top_reviews.body: Plastic quality is bad, crack/broken with in a week. Unhygienic sipping tube- fungus constantly grows inside the tube and it’s difficult to clean. Not worth for the price paid.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Plastic quality is bad, crack/broken with in a week.
Unhygienic sipping tube- fungus constantly grows inside the tube and it’s difficult to clean.
Not worth for the price paid.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Not designed properly
top_reviews.body: It could be more sturdy by using better plastic material. I had bought this the second time. First time it broke i thought it was our fault but my second buy i am convinced that the material and design flaw make the head and body to crack due to fragile outcome of product design. I hope cello improves this product designRead more
top_reviews.body_html:
It could be more sturdy by using better plastic material.
I had bought this the second time. First time it broke i thought it was our fault but my second buy i am convinced that the material and design flaw make the head and body to crack due to fragile outcome of product design.
I hope cello improves this product design
Read more

top_reviews.title: Easy to use
top_reviews.body: The bottle i received is same as shown. It's sturdy n easy to use for the toddler. Easy to open.. close n even easy to Clean . Just the perfect amount of water comes in one sip. The water doesn't spill or leak. My 3 year old is happily using it in school n loves to drink from it even at home. Price is fine.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
The bottle i received is same as shown.
It's sturdy n easy to use for the toddler.
Easy to open.. close n even easy to Clean .
Just the perfect amount of water comes in one sip.
The water doesn't spill or leak.
My 3 year old is happily using it in school n loves to drink from it even at home.
Price is fine.
